title: The Long Good Friday (1980) 1080p H.264 ENG-GER (moviesbyrizzo)
description: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0081070/ 1920 X 1080 H.264 video @8000k video bitrate 1hr 54 minute version (the Italian audio track we have is for our posted four minute shorter version instead - sorry - however we do include Italian subs with this version too!) audio track 1 448k stereo English Dolby AC3 audio track 2 192k stereo German Dolby AC3 Subs included for you here include Dutch English German Hungarian Italian Portuguese and Spanish For those that don't need the German audio please note its a 192k stereo AC3 track rather than the 768k mono DTS track in the original file, so it only takes little bandwidth and is included here as a courtesy as it was contained in the source file we obtained recently. This is my favourite mob movie - second only perhaps to the Godfather Series which has my other most favourite actor and personality in real life - Al Pacino As for The Long Good Friday, it has my other two favourites too I love Bob Hoskins equally and Helen Mirren is a most truly lovely gal to have co-star with him in this. Enjoy this great movie - one of my most favourites - great theme music too! Michael Rizzo Chessman (moviesbyrizzo)
